title.rendered: Professional Aircraft Accessories Enters Into Agreement With Liebherr-Aerospace

content.rendered:
Professional Aircraft Accessories, a Greenwich AeroGroup company, announced today that it has entered into a five year General Terms Agreement with Liebherr-Aerospace, the supplier of the landing gear systems for the Embraer E-Jet family.

The agreement, which is effective immediately, grants Professional Aircraft Accessories access to all E-Jet landing gear technical documentation, revision services, and technical engineering services for the Embraer E-Jet family including E-170, E-175, E-190 and E-195 as well as prior ERJ models E-135/E145, and consequently allows Professional Aircraft Accessories to provide full support regarding the above services.

“Our intuitive knowledge as a market leader in the regional landing gear sector made this agreement perfect for us,” said President of Professional Aircraft Accessories Robert Bial. “The cooperative efforts between Original Equipment Manufacturer (OEM) and the aftermarket will lead to improved service and support for the operator. Additionally, this agreement fits in perfectly with our recent expansion, which will enable us to continue to provide the level or service and support while accommodating larger landing gear systems.”

Professional Aircraft Accessories has invested in manuals, training, test equipment, parts and other dedicated equipment related to the Embraer models.
